description: Try our easy to follow Rock 'N' Peach Yoghurt Splits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Stone fruit,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Rock 'N' Peach Yoghurt Splits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large yellow, peach, peeled, destoned, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine yoghurt, vanilla and syrup in a bowl. Pour mixture evenly into 10 x 1/3-cup iceblock moulds. Insert sticks and freeze overnight or until firm.
Process rockmelon and peach in a food processor until smooth. Taste and add extra syrup, if desired. Combine and pour over firm yoghurt layer. Freeze overnight or until firm.
To serve, dip moulds briefly in hot water to loosen and carefully remove yoghurt splits.
